metadata.description: To forget about her old company, Ayano moves to a new company. I didn’t want to be around people who knew me but unfortunately an old childhood friend works here, Takagi.  I haven’t seen him in years and now he’s tall, competent and as cheerful as ever.  "Am I no good?" Takagi hold me and kisses me, I want to bury these feelings! I can’t hold back! My body wants it!
metadata.name: 2 AM, Scold Me With a Kiss
